item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.category: Minor Disruption - up to 15 minutes delay
item.description: Location : The M54 eastbound between junction J1 and the M6 . Status : Currently Active. Return To Normal : Normal traffic conditions are expected between 14:30 and 14:45 on 17 September 2016. Delay : There are currently delays of 15 minutes against expected traffic. Reason : Congestion.
item.title: M54 eastbound between J1 and M6 | Eastbound | Congestion
